lexer

Interface Action<T>


  • public interface Action<T>
    Used to add a custom action in between finding the token in the lexer and storing it.
    Author:
    Joshua Lipstone

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Token action(java.util.regex.Matcher match, Lexer lexer, Type<T> type) 

    • Method Detail

      • action

        Token action(java.util.regex.Matcher match,
           Lexer lexer,
           Type<T> type)
             throws LexerException
        Parameters:
        match - the token in the String
        lexer - the lexer that found the token
        Returns:
        the result of applying the Action on the token
        Throws:
        LexerException
